channel.title: OBLIVION2 [DELTA] Where your dream quests come true
channel.description:
Over: http://uppit.com/0wpcudyf7r3d/12-2-13.rar
THIS WILL BE UPDATED EVENTUALLY Oblivion2, containing all the features of P oblivion, as we're using that base, but here i am continuing this project with another person. The main story wont be about oblivion, allthough there will be some quests about oblivion ;)
Please note that most of the goals are the same as in the first project, so if you want to see them if you haven't yet you can take a look [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586201.msg4162587.html#msg4162587]here.[/url]
media:
Main story: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpd2QHRy-ao[/youtube] Smelting: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jxxGHMlmzbY[/youtube] City toll preview: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qiI85vUm1Dc[/youtube] Package: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/np26o8.png[/img] Stab test. [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/27xnrj9.png[/img] Meat meat meat [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2r221ed.png[/img] Mining :) [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1fec1u.png[/img] Smithing bitches! [img]http://thumbnails106.imagebam.com/23133/922b9d231322514.jpg[/img] [img]http://thumbnails106.imagebam.com/23133/4e4003231322537.jpg[/img] Our development log. [code] Packets are handled in their own file Dialogues are handled in their own file. all classes start with capital. 1/1/13 Neat packaged. Added some moar handlers Smelting works with interface. (got to fix little bugs) Started researching on pathfinders. Added Shutdownhook added isaacCipher class smelting almost done. added more of the main story 4/1/13 Smelting finished Most meats & fish can be cooked on fire.. Development log: 7-1-2013 - Almost done Faladors Dragon - Added Runecrafting thanks to randQm - Started with Smithing (having some problems with the interfaces..) 10/1/13 - Added a handler for smithing interfaces. (SmithingInterface) 1/02/13 - Added walking check for npcs. - 80% edgeville clipped - 50% falador clipped - Moved and Renamed some files - Added tolls handler. - Fixed Packets. (We had various if's affecting the whole method, so i removed/added brackets. - Re-Taken project (couldn't get working for 2 weeks because grounded) - made command and rotten apple to clip tiles.. so i don't have to do it manually. 12/2/13 - Leveling up with interfaces. - to edit tolls you had to edit lots of classes, now all we need is tolls class. - deactivated spellbook. [/code]
[size=14pt]Our team:[/size]
Head developer : Strucker (mr boogie) Programmers luna-scape (luna) Moderators : N/A
We need one client coder. Accepting requests for quests.
Special thanks to lare96, and all who helped me.

item.title: OBLIVION2 [DELTA] Where your dream quests come true
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Over: http://uppit.com/0wpcudyf7r3d/12-2-13.rar

i really got bored about this project it was initially started to make a feel of oblivion but we luna and i couldn’t follow that concept, we were always like oh yea quest server or w.e, with the time i lost intereset developing this.

it has 3 antileeches to keep the big newbs out.

@strucker wrote:

Flame_:

May I ask why you would need a moderator at this time in your development?

question, “Packets are handled in their own file”

so you re-did all your packets using an array or hashmap? or you just moved code out of the client class?
[/quote] i just moved them.

Better to use an array/hashmap.[/quote]
ok, thanks.

item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[code]1/02/13

  • Added walking check for npcs.
  • 80% edgeville clipped
  • 50% falador clipped
  • Moved and Renamed some files
  • Added tolls handler.
  • Fixed Packets. (We had various if’s affecting the whole method, so i removed/added brackets.
  • Re-Taken project (couldn’t get working for 2 weeks because grounded)
  • made command and rotten apple to clip tiles… so i don’t have to do it manually.
    [/code]

We need a client coder and we also need a moderator when the game comes out…

item.title: OBLIVION2 [DELTA] Where your dream quests come true
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

arham 4:

Bump.

Thanks for free bump :).

Some ideas for server we may add:

Introduction

After every player did his tutorial jail quest they will be teleported to a random city located in the world of oblivion2 those places will be surrounded with invisible barriers and gates to get acces to new places/cities.

So how do we get access to the new places and or cities luna?

Like we already stated, oblivion 2 will be all about doing quests with friends. This will really give a close feeling with the community and your main city. To gain access to new places or cities you must acomplish quests for people in the city to gain points. If you gain enough points you can talk to the city boss and you will be handed a key which isnt tradeable. With this key you can unlock the gates to get more access in the world of oblivion.

How will the pvp system go?

We haven’t really discussed about that but you don’t have to be afraid it will be definately in oblivion 2. Maybe we add a npc which gives you the possabilty to teleport you to a pking area this oppurtunity will be given by peple who have completed the quests for this.

(Ill add more information soon about my ideas, tired now.)

Please post your ideas to help us

Read full topic
